name: stores
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ikea_api.
Tool description: This [unofficial] Ikea API is a great solution for developers looking for a comprehensive and up-to-date access to Ikea's products and search. An Ikea Scraper REST API solution.
API description: Fetches a list of all IKEA stores in a specified country.

countrycode.description: The two-letter country code representing the country for which to fetch the list of stores.
